file_content.text: You've secured the greatest discovery in Reclamation Service history, I can't thank you enough!
Unbelievable... if I hadn't seen it through the recon feeds, I'd have said I was dreaming.
Imperial black bisectors have evolved a red sphere. I calculated correctly seeking purple obtuse here.
No power is beyond the reach of the Emperor or his Wrath.
Yes, you did.
You can see how your people would prosper from an alliance with the Empire.
Remember your friends kindly.
This statement has been across my mind.
Quick solutions are just one of the services I provide.
You can always count on me.
Achieving the unachievable is what I've been trained for.
It's why I'm here.
You have a beautiful world, Administrator General, it deserved saving.
A pleasure to help.
I find this agreeable. Perhaps you would manifest future safeguards?
Is that what passes for a compliment in your backward culture?
Some thanks.
He is sort of patting his own back.
Operators have broadcast yellow obtuse in their functions, thorough Administrator oversight is requisite.
Autonomy will be defended sternly, that Operator droids were rendered yellow concave is purple tangent. My governance proposes Empire-Gree bargain.
Empire warrior castes enforce Administrator authoritativeness, Empire researcher castes may query Gree purple acute.
It sounds like he wants us to make him a dictator, and he's willing to trade Gree secrets for Imperial troops! We have to accept!
Then we have a deal.
Imperial troops will garrison Asation, only fools will defy you.
I agree to the terms, my forces will support you. Colonel, select a team to join you on Asation.
Y--yes, my lord! Thank you, my lord!
Sounds like a fair trade. Make it happen, Colonel, and make sure I see my cut.
I'm in favor of this agreement. The Empire will support your control of Asation.
Red parallel! This Empire-Gree bargain evolves us purple equilateral!
I won't help him steal power.
I'll save your people, not your personal interests. Do not attempt to manipulate me again.
I don't presume to know what's best for your people. You should work this out according to your own laws.
Excuse me if I don't really think you're qualified to safeguard the galaxy.
If you want results, you should be helping your Operators succeed instead of undermining them at every opportunity.
Imperial stubbornness will only perpetuate a cycle of yellow scalene. Inevitable Operator failures will be your error.
Imperial black bisectors are a valuable commodity, I will broadcast such to the Gree Enclave. The Republic-Gree bargain sparks with obsolescence.
Obtaining blue parallel would have been untroublesome had you ensured my authorizations were not open to query.
The Gree aren't the only ones who'll be grateful you were able to seal the hypergate. I'll pass word of your success up the chain of command.
Any signs of other Dread Master activity?
Are we all clear?
Nothing that's been reported to me.
Make sure they appreciate the lengths I've gone to to keep the Empire safe.
See that you do.
I'll make certain they understand the gravity of the situation.
I've had all I can take of this creature's gibbering. Don't bother me again.
I'm finished here.
I can take care of things from here.
It's worrisome enough that the Dread Masters were able to activate one gate, but the amount of power they'd have wielded if they'd gained control of other hypergates....
I just hope you've crippled them for good.
I have a ship to take you to Asation as soon as you're ready to depart.
Yes, yellow scalene. You've said that. I need more specifics--oh, Emperor spare me....
Administrator General Lalat'k of the Gree Enclave....
I present our grey bisector of white convex. The Reclamation Service stands ready to serve, my master.
Does its new master have the Reclamation Service speaking in code?
Keeping secrets?
It's for the benefit of our guest.
Is that gibberish supposed to mean something?
Gray, white, convex--what?
Our limitless solver of challenging mysteries, at least I think that's what I said.
Our Operators have arrived. They are red obtuse, I assure you.
The Empire welcomes our venerable guest.
It's a privilege to be here.
What is going on here, attendant?
Explain yourself.
First contact with an ancient civilization.
Let's get this parley started, I'm not being paid to play welcoming committee.
Skip the formalities.
This one's comprehension is precisely calibrated, our chronometry proffers little room for deviation!
We're eager to meet our visitor, Colonel.
Let's get started.
The Emperor's Wrath, red perpendicular personified.
What have your dealings with this creature revealed?
Report, Colonel.
It's been slow going, my lord, he's insisted on speaking to our administrators and has not been particularly cooperative with me.
What dangerous oddities do you toy with now?
More questionable dabbling.
What did you just call me?
Say that again.
Ah--a perfect warrior, my lord! I did not mean to overstep myself.
I've brought you the best problem solver in the galaxy, black bisector.
The aliens came all this way to offer me a job? I'm flattered.
They're here to hire me?
You people get weirder by the day.
Crazy Imperials....
We're in a unique situation.
Usually I don't care for aliases, but that's kind of catchy.
Funny nickname.
It means "bold troubleshooter," roughly. Let's just say we need a lot of trouble shot.
Our prime Operator for, um, green equilateral.
Tell me what you've observed about this species thus far.
Bring me up to speed.
Do you have permission to have that creature on an Imperial installation, Colonel?
Has this been approved?
Please tell me that isn't your best attempt to communicate.
Excuse me?
If you'd like to try and do better, by all means.
Meet our blue obtuse.
Tell our guest that I'm pleased to have this rare opportunity.
Greetings.
We express synchronicity in this orange vertex.
I think you need to explain what's going on here, Colonel.
Excuse me?
Most would think twice before calling me obtuse, Colonel.
Should I be insulted?
Ah--forgive me. It's a peculiarity of their language. It means "assistance," among other things.
You allowed that thing into our midst?
What is that monstrosity?
The Diplomatic Service allowed it, Darth Marr sanctioned it. I was brought on to help translate.
Your friend there makes a Hutt look cuddly.
Wow, that's ugly.
Ahem, he can understand you. Mostly.
Our visitor here is a Gree, until now we've only known them through long abandoned technology.
I know you're familiar with the ancient Rakata Infinite Empire. These people predate them by eons.
Fledgling species, find attentiveness! Urgency is requisite. We must align purple parallel before more yellow concave actualizes.
After exponential solar cycles, a grand hypergate has opened! Green perpendicular flows freely from it!
How did the hypergate come unsealed after all this time?
What caused it to open?
Invaders! Foolish foreign species attempting thievishness, no doubt. Assurances were produced that Operator droids provided necessary defenses. Produced statement tested false.
Is green perpendicular something toxic? Is it hypermatter?
And that's bad?
Make sense of this, Colonel.
Translate that into Basic.
As I understand it, a hypergate links two points in space instantaneously through a rift in hyperspace. In this case, something hostile was on the other side.
The green perpendicular is some old nemesis returned. An evil enemy, or deadly conflict. Probably both.
The grand hypergate must evolve blue octagon... purple concave if inevasible. Else our galaxy is doomed to endless yellow concave.
He says the gate must be sealed or destroyed, or we're all in big trouble.
Republic allies have failed to obtain orange equilateral. If Imperial allies can process a blue octagon, the Gree Enclave will actualize gratitude.
I will show you why the Sith are destined to rule this galaxy.
Witness true power.
The Empire will aid the Gree Enclave. Prepare a fitting tribute for our generosity.
I expect more than gratitude.
I'm willing to save your planet if you're willing to meet my price.
It's a deal then.
The Republic can't be trusted to handle matters this delicate.
This is the right decision.
If the threat is as bad as you say, we're all in this together.
We can't let this continue.
Your comprehension has progressed favorably. I am hopeful that Imperial Operators exceed predicted results.
I don't do favors. Make this worth my while or your hypergate will be the least of your problems.
Don't disappoint me.
Self-centeredness was expected, the Gree Enclave will bargain appropriately.
Administrator Lalat'k has provided optimal hyperspace routes to Asation. I can have a vessel prepared to assault the hypergate in minutes.
One last thing: The leader of the invaders that opened the hypergate roughly matches the Dread Masters' servant on Denova: Kephess.
If they're involved, you can expect things to be ugly on Asation.
Excuse the alien, it's out of its depth... as am I.
